title: 1143 - In Candide, Veritas
content: I came across this piece of candy the other day: it was a little bit of licorice with a cute panda animal face.  One end got squashed in the package, though, and the smile printed on the marshmallow part got flattened into sorrow.  A squash-and-stretch bi-polar bear, if you will.   Never was a truer piece of candy ever manufactured than this.  Too much truth for me to swallow, literally.
